title: Microlearning for Medication Treatment Simulations for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Pharmaceutical Knowledge and Understanding of Chronic Disease Management
context.additional_context: Ensuring flexibility to divide learning time during work hours while utilizing mobile devices in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex drug interaction simulation scenarios with over 85% accuracy
90% of participants report increased confidence in judging drug efficacy after simulation-based assessments
Within one week of completing the course, over 75% demonstrate the ability to develop treatment plans applicable to real-world tasks in a comprehensive evaluation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
